patthana22.6:4.1: Nakusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:5.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.6:6.1: Nakusalaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:6.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.6:7.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:7.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.6:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:9.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:9.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.6:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:11.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:11.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.6:12.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:13.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:14.1: Nakusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.6:14.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
